column1: Card payment was rejected. Please try again.

column1: Could not connect to the bank. Code ERR_PAG.

column1: Data invalid gateway to accept payments.
column2: Datos de pasarela no válidos para aceptar pagos. Asegúrate de que no sean de una pasarela de Test.

column1: Pay safely with your credit card through the BBVA.
column2: Paga de manera segura con tarjeta con la garantía de BBVA.

column1: You must authorize the advanced options Nimble Payments.
